structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Endorsement Of Fees; Certificate Of Use Of Conveyance; Penalty
law.text: No fees for the service of any process of which the officer is required to make a return shall be allowed, unless itemized and endorsed on the process; and no allowance for the use of a conveyance in the service of a civil process shall be made, unless the officer certifies that it was necessary for him to use a conveyance, and that he actually used such conveyance for the distance set forth in his certificate. An officer who makes a false certificate under this section or section ten shall forfeit thirty dollars for each offence, to the use of the commonwealth.
